title: Has anyone ever written a letter to Donald Trump? Did he answer back? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Not me personally, but a very close personal friend's father wrote to Trump in the late 1980s saying he should run for president. Donald Trump wrote a very nice personal letter in response saying he would consider it. He keeps Trump's response letter in his business office.
Current White House wisdom is the 45th president does not even the CIA DAILY BRIEFINGS… prefers watching it live on Cable TV. So don’t expect him to read your letter.
